title: Saw you on your phone....
content: Please do your work during working hours. You have been slacking...

title: Please make sure you send that PO by end of day
content: We need to get the elevator maintenance guys paid...

title: We hit our goal!
content: Thank you for your hard work and dedication!

title: Do something about those lights!
content: They are too damn bright man. I need to work. My poor eyes.

title: What do I do when a PO does not work
content: I submitted a PO and it does not work

title: Tell me I am awesome without saying I am awesome
content: I just fixed your problem man! Pay me!
